long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Convenient case law search engine located in your browser toolbar
- Highlights and hyperlinks case citations on webpages so they are just one click away
- Search for judgments by case name and case citation
- Automatically rename downloaded PDFs to follow the standard <case name> <case citation>.pdf naming system
- Renames PDFs downloaded from Singapore Statutes Online (https://sso.agc.gov.sg) to avoid truncation of file name

Support for the following jurisdictions:

- United Kingdom
- Hong Kong
- Australia
- Canada
- Singapore
- Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU)
- European Court of Human Rights (ECHR / ECtHR)
- and more

Searches the following databases (amongst others): BAILII, AustLII, CanLII, NZLII, HKLII, National Archives Find Case Law, etc.

Open access to case law without having to use proprietary databases such as LawNet, WestLaw, or LexisNexis.

See https://clerkent.huey.xyz for more details, and for the source code
